revised_title: Matrix Wiener-Hopf Factorization for Sound Scattering by Staggered Plates
tldr: The authors study the scattering of sound waves by two semi-infinite parallel staggered plates using the Wiener-Hopf technique. They develop an explicit matrix Wiener-Hopf factorization to solve the problem and derive an asymptotic expression for the field scattered to infinity. This work contributes to understanding sound scattering and has applications in acoustics and engineering.
